rules_text:
[i]Orphan of Ashnard[/i] – Pelleas, Shackled Heir enters, you become the monarch.
[i]Carreau[/i] – {B}: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
[i]Fenrir[/i] – {3}{W}{B}: Destroy target noncreature nonland permanent. Activate this ability only if you are the monarch.
